home.subheaderText: Take Workout Tracking to the Next Level
home.appFeatureP: This is how we help in optimizing the results you achieve at the gym

featureList.featureOneDetails: These graphs offer a dynamic representation of your fitness journey, and they can be displayed across various timelines, including weekly, monthly, and yearly intervals.
featureList.featureTwoDetails: View a comprehensive overview of your weekly workouts at a glance, with each day's focus and planned exercises laid out for you.
featureList.featureThreeDetails: Enjoy the freedom to switch up your routine regularly. With a wide range of exercises at your fingertips
